root: ^Hey! If it isn't Nicholas! What can I do for you, pal?
^Just wanted to have a look around.

c-0: ^I'm here for this. I just want to see it, make sure it's still here?

give_ticket: ^Sorry pal, but you know the policy. I don't take anything from out back until your loan is repaid in full.
^Huh? No way! What kind of policy is that?
^It's the policy you signed off on.
^Hey, You gonna waste any more of my time? Total plus interest is $43. You have enough?

c-0: ^Perfect. Let me get that watch for you.
c-1: ^Well, you remember how this works right?
^I loaned you $30 for your watch, and to get it back, you have to repay the loan plus interest and fees.
^Come back with $43, and you can get it back right away, ok?
